io.openems.edge.meter.api

Interface SymmetricMeter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OpenemsComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsymmetricMeter, SymmetricPvInverter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeneconMiniGridMeter, FeneconMiniPvMeter, FeneconProPvMeter, GridMeter, GridMeter, KostalPikoGridMeter, MeterBControlEM300, MeterCarloGavazziEm300, MeterJanitzaUmg96rme, MeterMicrocareSDM630, MeterSocomecDirisA10, MeterSocomecDirisA14, MeterSocomecDirisB30, MeterSocomecDirisE24, NRCMeter, ProductionMeter

    public interface SymmetricMeter
extends OpenemsComponent
    Represents a Symmetric Meter. - Negative ActivePower and ConsumptionActivePower represent Consumption, i.e. power that is 'leaving the system', e.g. feed-to-grid - Positive ActivePower and ProductionActivePower represent Production, i.e. power that is 'entering the system', e.g. buy-from-grid

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  SymmetricMeter.ChannelId
